page.title: 11The Arts
page.content: the promotion and development of drama The Llandrindod Wells Drama Festival gives further stimulus to the perform- ing arts by holding an annual drama competition.The committee invites six amateur companies to take part. There is an painting club,a film society,a local history group called the Radnorshire Society and the Friends of the Museum provide support for the local Museum.There are two Welsh Language and Cultural Societies: Cymdeithas y Ddraig Goch and Clwb y Dysgwyr.Welsh dinners,Noson Lawen and Twmpath are organised by these groups with the latter being particularly concerned with the needs of Welsh learners.
